b:with.value: "window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=600, height=400, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
a.title: share on facebook

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=550, height=450, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;

b:include.data: { sharingId: data:sharingId, originalUrl: data:post.url, platforms: data:this.sharing.platforms, shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl, shareTitle: data:post.title, }
